page.title: 13COMMUNICATIONS IN LOCHFOOT
page.content: THE VILLAGE HAS ITS OWN POST OFFICE WHICH IS ALSO A GENERAL STORE. HOURS OF OPENING ARE 9-5.30 (CLOSED 1-2), BUT ON WEDNESDAYS AND SATURDAYS IT IS OPENED 9-12.30. APART FROM BUYING POSTAGE STAMPS, CUSTOMERS CAN CASH GIRO CHEQUES, CHILD BENEFITS AND PENSIONS,PAY TELEPHONE ACCOUNTS, OBTAIN TELEVISION LICENCES AND SEND RECORDED DELIVERY AND REGISTERED MAIL. THERE ARE MAIL COLLECTIONS TWICE DAILY AT 10.00 AND 15.00 FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY WITH ONE COLLECTION ON SATURDAY AT 11.30. LOCHFOOT HAS ITS OWN TELEPHONE EXCHANGE WHICH COVERS LOCHRUTTON AND IRONGRAY PARISHES.
